comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: 512 George St looks to be the building occupied by McLean Bros & Rigg, which was destroyed by fire on 18/6/1891 - news.google.com/newspapers?id=p7hPAAAAIBAJ&sjid=RZMDA... Per this September 1885 Illustrated Sydney News item, the building at 512 George St appears to have then been recently completed...McLean Bros & Rigg evidently occupied the building from ca. September 1885 - nla.gov.au/nla.news-article64036572 So I'd say we're looking at a date range ca. Sept 1885 -June 1891. I'm also sure I've seen that taxi driver in other Tyrrell Collection pics!
